author: dreid
msg: The new memory code from Sander, Luke and Elrond.  This has been modified to
get it building within the APR framework, some code has been adapted to the
ASF coding style (though more needs doing).  There is still some work to
do to get the code integrated correctly.

author: dreid
msg: Add a new error value APR_ENOCLEANUP that's used by the new shared memory code.
Also start adding the new memory code.  I wasn't sure if we wanted to split out
the standard memory allocation stuff from the main header as this should be
our "standard" and thus normally needed. So, I left it in :)

author: dreid
msg: In trying to get as many modules as possible building this flag is required
to get mod_auth_dbm building.  Is this the correct place for it to be

author: dreid
msg: This removes MM from the beos build.

author: trawick
msg: fix a comment regarding APR_EOF and file I/O;
use APR_SUCCESS instead of 0 in apr_file_read() for Win32
